wikipedia_page.main: Eric Tait (born 17 June 1951) is an English former football player and manager.

response: In 2004–05, Newcastle Blue Star was promoted into the Northern League Division One after ending the season in third place. Under the management of Eric Tait, Blue Star had a fantastic return to Division One, winning it for the first time and also completing the double by winning the Northern League Cup. Unfortunately for the club, it was not promoted because their Wheatsheaf Ground did not reach league standards.
* Eric Tait (born 1951), English football player and manager
* Eric Tait (born 1951), played and managed for Berwick Rangers
